metadata.description: Structured list of monetization strategies for PTRegistry, covering API revenue, manufacturer partnerships, market intelligence, and value-added services.

revenueStreams.name: Freemium API Access Tiers
revenueStreams.description: Tiered API access model where free users get basic product search and limited results, while paying tiers unlock full specifications, cross-references, AI recommendation endpoints, and higher rate limits.

tiers.name: Free / Developer
tiers.purpose: Drive adoption, build ecosystem, create upgrade pipeline

tiers.name: Professional
tiers.targetCustomer: Engineering firms, small distributors, system integrators, independent consultants

tiers.name: Enterprise
tiers.targetCustomer: Large OEMs, major distributors, AI platform companies, procurement platforms
features: All endpoints including AI recommendation engine
Real-time pricing and availability data (where manufacturer provides)
Full AI metadata (application suitability, selection tips, common mistakes)
Bulk data export for offline analysis

revenueStreams.scalability: High - marginal cost per additional API call is near zero

revenueStreams.name: Manufacturer Sponsorship Tiers
revenueStreams.description: Manufacturers pay for enhanced visibility, data richness, analytics, and priority placement in AI recommendations. This is the primary B2B revenue stream.

tiers.name: Basic Listing
features: Up to 100 products with basic specs (8 fields)
tiers.purpose: Get manufacturers on the platform, build comprehensive database, create upsell pipeline

revenueStreams.scalability: Medium - requires dedicated account management for large partners

revenueStreams.name: Market Intelligence & Search Analytics
revenueStreams.description: Anonymized, aggregated search and query data sold as market intelligence reports. Reveals what engineers are searching for, trending specifications, regional demand patterns, and competitive comparison frequency.

products.name: Quarterly Industry Trends Report
products.description: Comprehensive analysis of search trends, specification demand shifts, emerging application patterns, and regional demand signals. Published quarterly.
examples: Demand for IE4+ efficiency motors grew 45% QoQ, driven primarily by European searches
Servo motor searches with 'food-grade' or 'washdown' keywords increased 120% year-over-year
Cross-reference queries for Baldor legacy models represent 22% of all motor searches (replacement opportunity)
Average requested bearing bore diameter trending upward, suggesting equipment upsizing trend

products.name: Competitive Intelligence Dashboard
products.description: Real-time dashboard showing how often your products are compared to competitors, which specs cause you to win or lose comparisons, and what gaps exist in your product line relative to search demand.
features: Head-to-head comparison frequency against specific competitors
Demand gap analysis: specs being searched that no product in your catalog matches
Trending search terms relevant to your product categories

products.name: Custom Market Research
products.description: Bespoke research reports using PTRegistry search data combined with industry analysis. Examples: 'Is there demand for a 200kW IE5 motor in the North American market?' or 'What is the most searched-for but least available gear ratio range for planetary reducers?'
products.targetCustomer: Product development teams at major manufacturers

revenueStreams.timeToRevenue: 12-18 months (requires sufficient search volume for statistically significant data)
revenueStreams.scalability: Very high - data is a byproduct of normal operations
revenueStreams.privacyNote: All data is anonymized and aggregated. Individual user queries are never exposed. Minimum aggregation threshold of 50 queries before any trend is reported.

revenueStreams.name: White-Label API for Distributor Websites
revenueStreams.description: License PTRegistry's product selection AI and structured data as a white-label service for industrial distributors to embed in their e-commerce websites. Distributors get an AI-powered product selector; PTRegistry gets licensing revenue and broader data distribution.

offerings.name: Product Selector Widget
offerings.description: Embeddable JavaScript widget that provides AI-powered product search and recommendation on the distributor's website. Styled to match the distributor's branding.
features: Natural language product search ('I need a 5HP motor for a pump')
Guided specification filter with smart defaults
Cross-reference lookup ('find equivalent to ABB M3BP 132 SMB 4')
Responsive design for desktop and mobile

offerings.name: Full API License
offerings.description: Full API access branded for the distributor, powering their custom product selection workflow, chatbot, or mobile app.
features: Distributor-specific product catalog filtering (only show products they stock)
Custom pricing integration (distributor's prices, not list)

revenueStreams.name: Lead Generation & Purchase Routing
revenueStreams.description: When a user (human or AI) selects a product through PTRegistry, route the purchase intent to distributors or manufacturers who pay for qualified leads. Similar to how Google Shopping works for industrial products.

models.name: Cost Per Lead (CPL)
models.price: $5-50 per qualified lead (varies by product category and deal size potential)
models.description: When a PTRegistry user clicks 'Get Quote' or 'Find Distributor' for a product, the lead (contact information + product requirement) is routed to participating distributors or manufacturer reps.
models.qualification: Lead must include: product identified, quantity/specs confirmed, contact info provided, and buying intent confirmed

models.name: Affiliate/Referral Revenue
models.description: For products available for online purchase at distributors, PTRegistry earns a referral commission on purchases that originated from a PTRegistry recommendation.
models.implementation: Tracked via affiliate links, UTM parameters, or API-based attribution

models.name: RFQ Aggregation
models.description: Aggregate Request for Quote (RFQ) submissions from users and distribute to multiple competing distributors. Distributors pay for access to qualified RFQs in their territory and product specialty.
models.targetCustomer: Regional distributors who want qualified leads without large marketing budgets

revenueStreams.scalability: Very high - scales with platform traffic

revenueStreams.name: Premium OEM & Engineering Tools
revenueStreams.description: Advanced tools for machine builders (OEMs) and engineering firms who do repeated product selection as part of their design workflow. Subscription-based access to project management, saved configurations, and design automation features.

features.name: Project-Based Selection
features.description: Save product selections into named projects. Track which components were selected for each machine design. Revisit and modify selections as designs evolve.
features.price: Included in Professional API tier and above

features.name: Bill of Materials (BOM) Export
features.description: Export complete power transmission BOMs with part numbers, quantities, specifications, and pricing (where available) in standard formats (CSV, Excel, JSON, XML).
features.price: $49/month add-on or included in Enterprise tier

features.name: Design Configuration Templates
features.description: Pre-built selection templates for common drive train configurations (motor + gearbox + coupling, motor + belt drive + tensioner, etc.). Templates enforce compatibility rules.

features.name: Multi-User Team Workspace
features.description: Shared workspace for engineering teams to collaborate on product selections. Comment threads, approval workflows, and version history.

features.name: CAD Integration Plugin
features.description: Plugins for SolidWorks, AutoCAD, Inventor, and Creo that allow engineers to search PTRegistry and insert 3D models directly into their designs without leaving the CAD environment.

features.name: Parametric Selection API
features.description: API endpoint that accepts a complete drive system specification (required output torque, speed, duty cycle, environment) and returns a fully configured motor + gearbox + accessories package.

revenueStreams.name: Contextual Advertising & Sponsored Placement
revenueStreams.description: Non-intrusive advertising opportunities for manufacturers who want additional visibility beyond their partnership tier. Carefully implemented to maintain platform trust and data objectivity.

products.name: Sponsored Search Results
products.price: CPC model: $2-10 per click depending on category
products.description: Manufacturer products appear at the top of relevant search results with a 'Sponsored' label. Similar to Google Ads but for industrial products. The product must still meet the search criteria -- sponsorship only affects ranking, not relevance filtering.
products.guardrails: Maximum 2 sponsored results per search. Sponsored products must match at least 80% of search criteria. Clearly labeled as 'Sponsored'.

products.name: Category Sponsorship
products.description: A single manufacturer sponsors an entire product category (e.g., 'Bearings'). Their branding appears on the category landing page, and their products receive a boost in default sorting.
products.guardrails: One sponsor per category. Does not affect filtered/sorted results, only default view.

products.name: New Product Spotlight
products.description: Highlighted placement for newly released products. Appears in 'New Products' feed and in relevant search results for 30 days.
products.guardrails: Product must be genuinely new (released within last 6 months).

revenueStreams.revenueModel: CPC, CPM, or flat monthly rate
revenueStreams.scalability: High but must be carefully managed to maintain platform credibility
revenueStreams.risks: Over-monetizing advertising will erode trust with engineers. Must maintain strict separation between editorial/recommendation integrity and advertising.

year1.focus: Build catalog, onboard manufacturers, launch free API

year2.focus: Scale API adoption, launch paid tiers, begin market intelligence

year3.focus: Full platform maturity, all revenue streams active

competitiveAdvantages.description: More products in database attracts more API users. More API users generates more search data. More search data attracts more manufacturers. Flywheel accelerates over time.

Structured, AI-optimized product data with cross-references, application suitability scores, and selection tips is extraordinarily difficult and expensive to recreate. Each manufacturer relationship adds unique data that competitors cannot replicate.
Built from the ground up for AI consumption, not retrofitted from a human-facing catalog. Schema design, search algorithms, and response formats are optimized for machine reasoning.
Once AI agents, distributor websites, and OEM tools are integrated with PTRegistry's API, switching costs are significant. Every integration creates stickiness.
